Use the comprehensive species module here for an in-depth understanding of caulerpa. Modules include a comprehensive species guide, a species-​at-​a-​glance fact sheet, a related lesson plan, suggested activies, comprehension questions, and videos and related on-line resources. Caulerpa taxifolia is a type of invasive seaweed that can thrive in temperate waters.
